import React,{useState}from"react";import"./LoginPage.css";import mahindraLogo from"../../assets/mahindra-logo.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=_ref=>{let{onLogin}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[role,setRole]=useState("services");// Hardcoded credentials
const validUser="admin";const validPass="mahindra123";const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!username.trim()||!password.trim()){alert("Please enter both username and password");return;}if(username===validUser&&password===validPass){onLogin({username:username.trim(),role});}else{alert("Invalid username or password");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:mahindraLogo,alt:"Mahindra Logo",className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"title",children:"Welcome to Talk to Data"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"label",children:"Username"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input",type:"text",placeholder:"Enter Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"label",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input",type:"password",placeholder:"Enter Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"label",children:"Roles"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{className:"input",value:role,onChange:e=>setRole(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"services",children:"Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"sales",children:"Sales"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"login-btn",children:"Login"})]})]})});};export default LoginPage;
